Body:
Description: We attempted to upgrade the server from version 5.9.3 to 5.9.4. As part of the upgrade process, we initiated a system backup. However, we are facing an issue where the backup reaches 99% completion and then restarts from the beginning.

This cycle continues without completing successfully. We require assistance in resolving this issue and ensuring the backup completes as expected

What We've Learned Updated: 09.05
- the backup process is not finishing
- asked for screenshot
- told them we recommend VM snapshots before upgrading the server

Next Steps Updated: 09.05
- waiting on the customer

What We've Learned Updated: 09.05
- the backup process is not finishing
- asked for screenshot
- told them we recommend VM snapshots before upgrading the server

10.05:
We told the customer that System Backup V1 will be discontinued starting with the Endpoint Protector release 5.9.5.0.
We informed him about the alternatives and about the progress bar (for System Backup V1) that has no impact on any aspect.

---
We assured the customer that there is no issue proceeding with the server upgrade while there still is the recurring backup loop.
